alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 18 at 3:25PM CST until January 18 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Kenedy Island, Willacy Island and Cameron Island Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Wave run-up may approach the dunes along narrow beaches. Beach equipment, such as umbrellas and chairs, could be moved by waves. Vehicles driving along narrow beaches may experience higher water levels. Elevated water levels may also occur across the Laguna Madre and South Bay, and along State Highway 4 west of Boca Chica State Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide occurs at 4:15 PM, beachgoers can expect the closest approach to the dunes an hour or two either side of high tide
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
